com.viaoa.html

Class OAFileInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.html.OAHtmlComponent
      • com.viaoa.html.OAFileInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class OAFileInput
extends OAHtmlComponent
    Component for uploading a file from the browser to the server. OAForm.getAction() will automatically set the form submit to use enctype="multipart/form-data" and it will parse the request stream and save the file on the server. 
        [Java Code]
    OAFileInput fi = new OAFileInput("fileName");
    form.add("fiFile", fi);
    ....
    [HTML Code]
    <input type="file" name="fiFile">
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setMax

        public void setMax(int x)
        max length of file that can be uploaded. If -1 (default) then unlimited. If file is greater then this amount, then OAForm.processRequest will throw an error.
